"The blind side"? & would it be possible for you to seed for case 39? I'll seed after downloading..

Thanks lilars, it is nice piece and your nice gesture too, however, from the experience I have; knowing from where attack comes and how is performed in reality means nothing.
Knowing all details and do what? Respond? Attack back? Well, I do not to waste my time on that. Beside, cat&mouse play is the part of this game.  If I see (like the guy in "Matrix"... you know - the one who watch the screen full of endless streams of numbers and letters not understandable to any other) attack or suspicious behavior I simply block. I can block one IP, I can block a range, block intrenet providers, block whole network back-bones, whole countries and even whole frikkin continent. I did so in the past.

I even can block ANYBODY - by turning damn computer off or at least - a router.

If I want to... but I don't.
I knew that I couldn't use it,too big a learning curve for me,maybe someone else can.Have a good evening.
